widget.name: ScrollToElementWidget
widget.description: Scroll element into view when attribute value was changed.

property.caption: Class to search
property.description: The widget will scroll the element into view with this class and the attribute value.

property.caption: Listen to attr
property.description: The attribute to listen to. If the value changes, the widget will scroll the element into view that has the value and the specified class.

property.caption: Delay before setting focus
property.description: With large pages, loading all elements can take some time. Use the delay if necessary
